dcterms:description: A crowdsourced corpus of intensity annotations for tweets containing emotion words and their corresponding intensity scores.

dcterms:description: A dataset for the SemEval-2018 task on emotion detection in tweets, focusing on the affective content of tweets.

Felipe Bravo-Marquez
dcterms:description: A dataset containing emotion intensity annotations for tweets, used for evaluating emotion intensity prediction models.

dcterms:description: A novel dataset densely populated with intensifiers, used for evaluating the impact of intensifiers on emotion intensity prediction.
dcterms:title: Novel dataset densely populated with intensifiers
